Package org.jetel.component

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ComponentDescription
    This is description of a component type loaded from 'component' extension point.
    ComponentDescription.Port  
    ComponentMetadataProvider
    This metadata provider extends regular MetadataProvider, so engine component is available for provider.
    JavaRunnable
    Interface used by Java Execute component, which needs instance of this interface in order to execute code require by it (by calling run() method).
    MetadataProvider
    Components can provide default metadata for theirs input and output ports.
    MultiMetadataProvider
    MetadataProvider which allows to provide multiple metadata for a single port.
    RecordFilter
    Interface for record-filtering transformations based on boolean condition.
    RecordGenerate
    Interface used by all components performing some sort of generate operation - ExtRecordGenerator, Join, etc.
    RecordsFilter
    Extension of RecordsFilter interface, where filtering can be performed on collection of DataRecords.
    RecordTransform
    Interface used by all components performing some sort of reformat operation - Reformat, Join, etc.
    RemoteEdgeComponent
    This simple interface is implemented by both artificial components (RemoteEdgeDataReceiver and RemoteEdgeDataTransmitter) which are used for connection establishing for remote edges.
    Transform
    Common transform interface which defines methods common to all transforms.
    TransformDescriptor<T>
    This class aggregates all necessary information for a transformation interface (transformation code loaded by various components RecordTransform, RecordRollup, JavaRunnable, ...)

    ComponentMessages  
    Concatenate

    CopyByNameMapping
    Simple replacement for CustomizedRecordTransform in CTL wildcard mapping.
    CTLRecordFilter
    Base class of all Java filter generated by CTL-to-Java compiler from CTL filters.
    CTLRecordFilterAdapter  
    CTLRecordGenerate
    Base class of all Java transforms generated by CTL-to-Java compiler from CTL transforms in the DataGenerator component.
    CTLRecordGenerateAdapter  
    CTLRecordTransform
    Base class of all Java transforms generated by CTL-to-Java compiler from CTL transforms in Reformat-like and Joiner-like components.
    CTLRecordTransformAdapter  
    CustomizedRecordTransform
    Class used for generating data transformation.

    DataRecordGenerate
    Base class used for generating any kind of data generation.
    DataRecordTransform
    Base class used for generating any kind of data transformation.

    Denormalizer Component Component: Name: Denormalizer Category:Description: Denormalizes input records - ie composes one output record from several input records using user-specified transformation.

    * HttpConnector Component Component: Name: HttpConnector Category: Others Description: Component provides a functionality for sending http requests.

    HttpConnector.PartWithName

    Java Execute Component
    JmsReader
    JmsReader Component Component: Name: JmsReader Category:Description: Receives JMS messages and transforms them to data records using user-specified transformation class (so-called processor).
    JmsWriter
    JmsWriter Component Component: Name: JmsWriter Category:Description: Transforms incoming data records to JMS messages using user-specified transformation class (so-called processor).

    MysqlDataWriter
    Mysql data writer
    Normalizer
    Normalizer Component Component: Name: Normalizer Category:Description: Normalizes input records - ie decomposes each input record to several output records using user-specified transformation.
    OracleDataWriter
    Oracle data writer
    Partition
    Partition Component
    PortToPortMetadataProvider
    This metadata provider ensures that metadata from n-th input port are delegated to n-th output port and vice versa.
    PostgreSqlDataWriter
    PostgreSQL data writer This component loads data to postgre database using the psql utility.

    Reformat
    Reformat Component
    Rollup
    Rollup Component Executes the rollup transform on all the input data records.
    RunGraph
    This component can run separated graph

    SimpleGather

    Sort
    Sort Component
    SortWithinGroups
    SortWithinGroups Component Sorts the incoming data records based on the sort key within the specified group.
    SpeedLimiter
    Speed Limiter Component Component: Name:Speed Limiter Category:Description:All records from input port:0 are copied onto all connected output ports.
    StaticMetadataProvider
    This is basic implementation of MetadataProvider which has static set of provided metadata.
    StructureWriter
    StructureWriter Component
    SystemExecute
    System Execute Component
    TextTableWriter
    TextTableWriter Component
    TransformFactory<T>
    This class is used to instantiate a class based on source code.
    TransformLanguageDetector
    This utility class helps to detect type of given source code - CTL1, CTL2, JAVA and JAVA_PREPROCESS.
    Trash
    Trash Component
    TreeReader  
    TreeWriter  
    UniqueLabelsValidator
    This class adds warnings to the configuration status when the labels of the validated metadata are not unique.
    WrapperTL
    This class is used for executing code written in CloverETL transform language.
    XLSReader
    XLS Reader Component Parses data records from a XLS(X) file and sends them to specified output ports.
    XLSWriter
    XLS Writer Component Reads data records from an input port and writes them to a given XLS sheet in a XLS file.
    XMLExtract
    XMLExtract Component
    XmlReader  
    XmlWriter
    This writer component reads data records from any number of input ports and according to ports mapping definition of relations among records, creates structured XML file.
    XmlWriter.PortDefinition
    Description of input port mapping and record's relations with records from another ports.
    XmlXPathReader
    XML XPath Reader Component
    XSLDataTransformer
    Sort Component

    An auxiliary class used as a dirty fix solving non-visibility of commercial components from a package containing FileComponentFactory See issues CLD-3314, CLD-3435
